tooltip.spooktober.candy: An item apart of the Spooktober Fall event. A collectable treat that can be eaten for special effects.
tooltip.spooktober.candy_rare: An item apart of the Spooktober Fall event. A rare collectable treat that can be eaten for special effects that last longer than the common ones.
